outputs.output_descr:
The Republic of the Philippines is to undertake the preparation of its Third National Report for submission to the Convention on Biological Diversity. The preparation will be in line with CBD Decision VII/25B and according to the provided format.
The Government of the Philippines is requesting US$20,000 from the GEF for the preparation of the Third National Report. The support provided by the GEF will enable the Philippines to submit its Third National Report to the CBD in a timely manner with respect to the deadline set.

project_title: Preparation of the Third National Report to the UNCBD
